DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study evaluate effect blueberry dry powder glycemic status ( fast plasma glucose , 2h glucose concentration oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) , HbA1c ) subject prediabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Blueberry Dry Powder Glycemic Status Subjects With Prediabetes
DOC.criteria: Fasting plasma glucose 110125 mg/dL Taking antidiabetic drug Taking drug functional food may affect blood glucose level Fruit allergy Pregnant nursing child Participation clinical trial within 90 day commencement trial Renal hepatic dysfunction Heart disease
